org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes
Class BrightnessContrastOptionPane

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes.BrightnessContrastOptionPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, OptionPane
public class BrightnessContrastOptionPane
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements OptionPane

Provides an interface for the user to set the brightness and contrast of the current image or selection. This class consists of one JSlider for each of brightness and contrast, as well as an 'Apply' button, and a 'Reset' button.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham
See Also:
Serialized Form

updateForNewColour

public void updateForNewColour(java.awt.Color newFgColour,
                               java.awt.Color newBgColour)
Description copied from interface: OptionPane
update any relevant components within this option pane for the newly selected colour. For example, the LineOptionPane redraws all of its line preview icons in the new colour.

Specified by:
updateForNewColour in interface OptionPane
Parameters:
newFgColour - the new foreground colour that has been selected
newBgColour - the new background colour that has been selected
